channel.title: Dropping items on death (delta 317)
channel.description: The server i ended up with currently has it set that if you get pked you drop your items but not if you die by a monster. I have requests for this and so help on this will be much appreciated.

item.title: Dropping items on death (delta 317)

item.description:
@Leggyownz wrote:

The server i ended up with currently has it set that if you get pked you drop your items but not if you die by a monster. I have requests for this and so help on this will be much appreciated.
